title: Doodle Wash!
desc: Create a watercolour piece for each day of the month!

title: Create a piece based on your name!
desc: Using the first and last letter of your name, create a piece using the object and style you get!

title: Creatuanary
desc: During this month create a fun new creature using your birhtday!

title: Styluary
desc: During the month of February, choose a famous artist's style and be inspired by it!
